bill.summary:
Furthering Oversight in Expired Federal Grants Act
This bill amends the Grants Oversight and New Efficiency (GONE) Act to require the Office of Management and Budget to instruct each agency to submit the report required by such Act on the status of grant awards for calendar years 2018 through 2022.
